text: gns and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Apnea - Arthritis - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Cerebral hypomyelination - Chronic gastritis - CNS hypomyelination - Corpus callosum atrophy - Diarrhea - Dysphagia - Eczema - Elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate - Failure to thrive - Generalized tonic-clonic seizures - Horizontal nystagmus - IgG deficiency - Inflammation of the large intestine - Leukoencephalopathy - Muscular hypotonia - Neutropenia - Postnatal microcephal
